title: What's with this slight board update
body:
When using a mobile phone. Not sure about on the pc yet. There was an update to the boards today.

I'm no longer able to see notifications. Like when someone replies to me. Or posts in my discussion. Is anyone else having this same issue or am i just missing something simple from this change/update???

replies.body: There is a known issue with the new nav bar on mobile, so far as I know it's being worked on but I'll keep you posted if I hear anything else.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=meUGoexk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T12:09:11.178+0000)
>
> There is a known issue with the new nav bar on mobile, so far as I know it's being worked on but I'll keep you posted if I hear anything else.

Cheers :^)
No ETA on a fix but it is on the way :)
Hey sorry to bother you. Any more news?  The whole website is buggered on my phone these days. In the news section it wont let me resize the screen so i cant read shit lol.
'Fraid not :(, but I'll see if can chase it up for you (just maybe after the fallout from the flex business dies down a bit, the Rioters we normally talk to are swamped).
No worries thanks for your help :^)
The bar was indeed updated, and I personally liked the update on the boards. Looks funky and I dig funky ;)

They probably just broke it by updating it all together for the new client.

It works fine on PC, but i doubt it works on mobile.
